title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Sim Update 12 - ready to be released
description:
In this video we will have a look at what to expect in Sim Update 12. As you might have seen in my previous videos regarding the beta builds this will be a huge update which will fix a lot of things but also bring in some new functionality. In this video we will go through the latest information shared about it by Asobo this week.
